snippet: Hugely influential as a disco pioneer and hitmaker in the 1970s and ’80s, Mr. Moroder has assembled a new dance-pop album with collaborators including Sia, Kelis, Kylie Minogue and Britney Spears.
abstract: Musician Giorgio Moroder is set to release Deja Vu at age 75, his first album in 30 years; album falls in genre of dance-pop, which combines his signature disco style on which he made his name and electronic dance music that was heavily influenced by his work.
lead_paragraph: Hugely influential as a disco pioneer and hitmaker in the 1970s and ’80s, Mr. Moroder has assembled a new dance-pop album with collaborators including Sia, Kelis, Kylie Minogue and Britney Spears.

headline.main: Giorgio Moroder, the Cat in the ’Stache, Comes Back
headline.print_headline: The Cat in the ’Stache Comes Back
